attributes.action: Knight Paul and Barry Elliot (The Chuckle Brothers)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the chuckle brothers have been entertaining children and adults alike with their slapstick comedy show chucklevision for almost 21 years now. celebrities have been knighted for their over-rated work and it is time we celebrated real dedication to television.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
